IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_inventory') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_inventory GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_inventory @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT vault_id, id, item_code, item_count, slot_id FROM dbo.Guild_Inventories WHERE guild_id = @guild_id
SELECT g.vault_id, e.item_id, e.socket_count, e.option_script_1, e.option_value_1, e.option_script_2, e.option_value_2, e.option_script_3, e.option_value_3 FROM dbo.Guild_Equip_Item_Infos AS e INNER JOIN dbo.Guild_Inventories AS g ON e.item_id = g.id WHERE e.guild_id = @guild_id
SELECT g.vault_id, e.item_id, e.socket_slot_id, e.gem_code, e.option_script_1, e.option_value_1, e.option_script_2, e.option_value_2, e.option_script_3, e.option_value_3 FROM dbo.Guild_Equip_Item_Scoket_Infos AS e INNER JOIN dbo.Guild_Inventories AS g ON e.item_id = g.id WHERE e.guild_id = @guild_id
SELECT g.vault_id, a.item_id, a.option_script_1, a.option_value_1, a.option_script_2, a.option_value_2, a.option_script_3, a.option_value_3 FROM dbo.Guild_Accessory_Item_Infos AS a INNER JOIN dbo.Guild_Inventories AS g ON a.item_id = g.id WHERE a.guild_id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
